note: Cricket umpire, rugby fan (both codes), finder of bugs, perpetrator of programming abominations, mostly recovered sysadmin. BSc (third class (Hons)) in Talking Bollocks On Social Media. I like my music metallic or baroque, or ideally both. Time traveller at the rate of one second per second. To follow me, have actual content and a human-looking profile.
